edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache

Interface Cache


  • public interface Cache

    Interface to be implemented by all caches. A cache stores and retrieves unique images corresponding to OperationList objects, as well as Dimension objects corresponding to Identifier objects.

    Implementations must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Deletes all cached content corresponding to the image with the given identifier.

      Deletes expired images and dimensions from the cache.

      Adds an image's dimension information to the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        java.awt.Dimension getDimension(Identifier identifier)
                         throws CacheException

        Reads cached dimension information.

        If a dimension corresponding to the given identifier exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it.

        Parameters:
        identifier - Image identifier for which to retrieve a dimension.
        Returns:
        Dimension corresponding to the given identifier, or null if no non-expired dimension exists in the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • getImageInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getImageInputStream(OperationList opList)

        Returns an input stream corresponding to the given OperationList, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given operation list does not exist in the cache..

        If an image corresponding to the given parameters exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it.

        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list for which to retrieve an input stream for reading from the cache.
        Returns:
        Input stream corresponding to the given operation list, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given operation list does not exist in the cache.

      • getImageOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(OperationList opList)
                                   throws CacheException
        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list for which to retrieve an output stream for writing to the cache.
        Returns:
        Output stream to which an image corresponding to the given operation list can be written.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • purge

        void purge()
    throws CacheException
        Deletes the entire cache contents.
        Throws:
        CacheException - If the cache is misconfigured or there is some other error.
        CacheException

      • purge

        void purge(Identifier identifier)
    throws CacheException
        Deletes all cached content corresponding to the image with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier -
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • purge

        void purge(OperationList opList)
    throws CacheException
        Deletes the cached image corresponding to the given operation list.

        Throws:

      • purgeExpired

        void purgeExpired()
           throws CacheException
        Deletes expired images and dimensions from the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • putDimension

        void putDimension(Identifier identifier,
                  java.awt.Dimension size)
           throws CacheException
        Adds an image's dimension information to the cache. If the writing of the dimension is interrupted, implementations should clean it up, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the image corresponding to the given size.
        size - Dimension containing width and height in pixels.
        Throws:
        CacheException
